original_title: Hank Danger and the Space Mummy's Tomb
overview: Famed hero and adventurer Hank Danger leads an expedition to the Jungle Planet to retrieve a powerful energy source and winds up leading a revolution against the oppressive Robot Tribe and their evil Potentate Boltron.
tagline: It's time once again for danger!
title: Hank Danger and the Space Mummy's Tomb
